items.sentence: If Tom hadn\'t been sick, I\'m sure he\'d have gone with you.
Tom wants to make sure Mary knows what she\'s supposed to do.
Tom doesn\'t want to get married until he\'s in his thirties.
Tom had no intention of doing anything he didn\'t want to do.
Go to sleep, Tom. You need to wake up early tomorrow morning.
His lack of technical knowledge kept him from being promoted.
How long does it take to get from here to your house on foot?
What do you think would happen if the earth stopped spinning?
Whenever I lie down on my bed and read a book, I fall asleep.
Would I only work on weekends if I could? Of course, I would.
